metadata.title: CVE-2018-18409 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A stack-based buffer over-read exists in setbit() at iptree.h of TCPFLOW1.5.0, due to received incorrect values causing incorrect computation,leading to denial of service during an address_histogram call or aget_histogram call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpflow - 1.4.5+repack1-1ubuntu0.1
tcpflow-nox - 1.4.5+repack1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpflow package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.5+repack1-1ubuntu0.1').
